title: The Clock Tower
text: When Meryon etched this plate, the tower was being restored and was partly covered with scaffolding.  The tower is situated at the point where the Pont-au-Change intersects with the Ile de la Cit√©.  The massive structure dwarfs the teeming crowds on the bridge as well as the heavily laden barge under one of the arches.
creditline:
The William M. Ladd Collection
Gift of Herschel V. Jones, 1916
